name: CUBE2D (robertgamer250)
description:
Hi!

Cube 2D is a small platformer game with about 5 minutes of playtime.This is my first game so please forgive me for bugs and the kind of horrible music.Since the music is kinda bad i recommend setting your volume to 4 out 100.

The controls :

A - Move left.

D -Move right.

Space - jump.Note that holding this button will not make you jump higher.

Note that using Alt+F4 will close your browser.

I forgot to put the credits in the game so it will be here.                                                                       Credits:         Me.

                            Font is Munro.It was created by Ed Merritt.

Huge Thanks to the gamedev community  on youtube and everywhere else for helping me out with roadblocks and to you for reading through this page.
